cu.explanation_en: Setting the ciphering algorithm to the unknown enum 'nea9' will cause negotiation failure during the security negotiation phase and NAS registration rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting SSB periodicity to 0 (invalid) causes cell configuration failure, preventing proper SSB transmission and cell discovery.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 週期設定為 0（無效）會導致小區配置失敗，防止正確的 SSB 傳輸和小區發現。
